#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	long long t,n,temp,tt;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--){
	    cin >> n;
	    tt = n%4;
	    if(tt == 0){
	        cout << n << endl;
	    }else if(tt == 1){
	        cout << "1" << endl;
	    }else if(tt == 2){
	        temp = (n/4) + 1;
	        cout << (4 * temp)-1 << endl;
	    }else{
	        cout << "0" << endl;
	    }
	    
	}
	return 0;
}
